fxchat_setting_close_account_step_1: Before you submit the cancellation application to take effect, please confirm the following information to protect the security of your account and property:
fxchat_setting_close_account_step_1_list: Remove you from all Forexchat groups
The bound third-party account will be automatically unbound
The bound MT4 trading account will be automatically unbound
Orders to be cleared will be automatically settled
The balance of the Forexchat account is automatically emptied
fxchat_setting_close_account_step_2_list: We will keep your account rights for 7 days, and the account will be automatically cancelled after 7 days.
You can voluntarily return the application before canceling your account.
Once you have logged out, you will no longer be able to log in to Forexchat with that account.
fxchat_setting_close_account_step_3_plac: Please fill in the reason for cancellation (no less than 10 characters)
fxchat_setting_close_account_step_3_err_: Please fill in the reason for cancellation as required
fxchat_setting_close_account_step_end: By confirming the logout, you indicate that you have read and agree to the logout reminder
fxchat_setting_close_account_balance_con: Are you sure to close your account if it has a balance?
fxchat_setting_close_account_verify_titl: In order to protect the security of your account, verification is required to cancel your account
fxchat_setting_close_account_verify_con: A verification code has been sent to:
fxchat_setting_close_account_verify_err_: The verification code is incorrect, please re-enter it
fxchat_setting_close_account_verify_re_s: After {0}s, you can resend the verification code
fxchat_setting_close_account_result_titl: The cancellation request has been submitted
fxchat_setting_close_account_result_canc: Decide to revoke the request for account cancellation
